data.title: Hamilton RFC
data.text:
Hamiltons – KFM Best Amateur Sports Club Winner 2023

WE DID IT AGAIN! Hamilton SP RFC have won the Best Amateur Sports Club in the 2023 KFM Best of the Cape Competition. We won this prestigious award in 2021 and are thrilled to have been announced winners for the second time. This is testimony of the passion and...

Hamilton SP RFC Golf Day 23 June 2023

Our first team have been invited to participate in the inaugural Amateur Club Rugby World Cup in France in September this year. Being the oldest club in South Africa this is a huge honour for Hamilton. Hamilton SP RFC will be representing South Africa at the...

WP Reserve League Fixtures for 2023

Pre-season 2023 Newsletter

April Newsletter

Private Gathering with Jacques Nienaber

A private gathering with Jacques Nienaber will be held as a fundraising event for our first team, who will be participating in the Mondial Amateur Club World Club in France in September 2023.

Hammies whitewash Villagers at 145th Derby

Today was the 145th annual derby between the two oldest clubs in South Africa. All four Hammies teams won their games today, and held the shields up high. 1st team won 15 - 11 2nd team won 13 - 5 3rd team won 27 - 5 U20 team won 29 - 0 ...

The History of the Hamilton Villager Derby Day

The 145th Derby between Hamilton SP RFC and Villager RFC takes place at Hamilton SP RFC on Saturday 25 March. Our President, Dave Kagan, recounts the history behind the Derby. With Hamiltons being established in 1875, and Villager in 1876, these two clubs represent...

Hamilton SP RFC SLA Fixtures for 2023

200 days to go till France!

We are celebrating 200 days to go till the start of the Mondial Rugby Amateur Competition where Hamilton SP RFC will be competing against other amateur clubs from 20 countries from around the world. The competition takes place in France from 22 September to 1 October...

Hammies Stand Together to Support U13 NTK Player, Liam Human

One of NTK's most promising U13 prop stars, Liam Human, was recently diagnosed with cancer. His story touched the hearts of all the players and larger Hammies family. The players initiated encouraging shout out videos for this little warrior and dedicated all their...

Results from 10 – 11 March

The Hammies Juniors hosted NTK on Friday afternoon. It was a very successful day, with all our junior teams winning their games. Well done to all the players and coaches. The Hammies Seniors hosted Helderberg, playing our second last round of friendlies before league...

The Hamilton 1875 Club

The 1875 club is a fundraising initiative that not only raises funds for the club, but also gives members the chance to win some great monthly prizes. Hamilton is reliant on these funds to cover expensive utility costs and keep the facilities maintained and in good...

Hamilton SP RFC 2023

Hamilton Sea Point Rugby Football Club was established on 14 March 1875, making us the oldest rugby club in South Africa. We are situated on the Green Point common under the shadows of the Cape Town Stadium. We enter our 148th year with gratitude and huge excitement...

Tour to France in September 2023

We are super excited and proud to have been invited to the first World Amateur Rugby Festival taking place in France in September 2023. The World Amateur Club Rugby Festival will bring together 20 amateur clubs from the 20 of the world’s greatest rugby nations. For...

Hammies Newsletter – October 2023

Senior October Newsletter

Welcome to our 2023 Sponsorship Partners

The Hamilton SP RFC Committee are very excited to announce that Thorp Motor Group have renewed their sponsorship partnership with Hamilton SP RFC for another 2-year period. We love having them part of the Hammies family. Dekro Paints, SupAuto Panelbeaters, DSC...

High School Girls Rugby Starts at Hammies

For the first time in our club's 148 year history, we started our first ever girls practice session on Sunday 5 February down at the club. We have chosen to focus on the high school girls age group to get started and then build up from there. On Sunday a group of...

Chairman’s Report 2022

Life Members, members, Ladies and Gentlemen, welcome to the 148th AGM. Let me start by congratulating our U20 side who won the WP SLA U20 league. It is a remarkable achievement and the first time that our Club has won the league. Congratulations to Andries Carstens,...

Head Coach Appointments for 2023

Congratulations to Robert Olivier for being appointed as the Head Coach for the 1st Team next year. We wish you all the best Robert. Andries Carstens continue as Head Coach of the U20s.

Hammies Mid-season Newsletter

Hamilton SP RFC May Newsletter

Junior Newsletter May 2022

Junior May Newsletter Final

Hamilton SLA Fixtures for 2022

Festival Mondial du Rugby Amateur

We are super excited and proud to have been invited to the first World Amateur Rugby Festival taking place in France in 2023. The World Amateur Rugby Festival will bring together 20 amateur clubs from the 20 of the world’s greatest rugby nations. For the first time in...

Pre-season training starts 11 January 2022

https://youtu.be/3IcpnVSiYKo

Chairman’s Report 4 November 2021

Life Members, members, Ladies and Gentlemen, welcome to the 147th AGM. It has now been two seasons that we have not played club rugby in the Western Province Super and under twenty leagues. All our structures were in place to have a cracker 2021 season after the...

Soon Soon

We are all missing our rugby and our Hammies Family. We are hoping that practices will resume shortly and that we can continue building those golden memories! https://youtu.be/K8x9Cl0nD8A

1875 Club September Draw

Our 1875 Club September draw took place remotely this morning. Click here to view the video. The results were as follows: 1st prize - R2 700 won by number 55 2nd prize - R1 350 won by number 44 3rd prize - R810 won by number 50 4th prize - R540 won by number 58...

Practices cancelled till further notice

Sponsorship Opportunities at Hamilton SP RFC

The oldest club in SA, Hamilton SP RFC, have opened their doors for sponsorship opportunities. https://youtu.be/0m0suA-q9MI

Hammies Partnership Luncheon

The Hamiltons Partnership Luncheon took place this afternoon. Thank you Jurie Roux, CEO of SARU, who was our guest speaker, and to all our sponsors who attended. Great having you all part of the Hammies Family.

Hammies win 2021 Derby

Hamilton was the victor in yesterday's annual Derby Day clash against Villager, winning by 93 points to 0. Putting the score aside, Derby Day is always a special day for the two oldest clubs in South Africa, a day of rivalry, but also a day to celebrate the history...

New Hammies jerseys handed over

Special evening at Hammies last night - We handed over our brand new jerseys to our 1st team and 2nd team captain on the eve of Derby Day. Inspiring speeches by Dave Kagan, Jody Burch, Coach Phil, 1st team captain JP Lewis and Bryn Ressell. Thank you to our sponsors...

We say goodbye to a treasured Hammie’s gentleman

Our beloved Vice-President, life member and true legend of club rugby passed away peacefully on 22 July 2020. A humble and modest man, Morris served as a Western Province Rugby Liaison Officer for national and international teams for more than 30 years. Typical of his...

Celebrating three extraordinary gentlemen

We recently paid tribute to three true legends at Hammies. All three gentlemen have made huge contributions to the Club over the years. The two lounges were unveiled as the Bryn Ressell Lounge and the Marsh Shirtliff Lounge, and the committee room was unveiled as the...

Chairman’s Report 2020

What a roller coaster year it has been. After appointing Clinton Van Rensburg as rugby coordinator and Phil Cronje as head coach at the end of 2019, the two gentlemen swung into action and recruited several new players and managed to keep many of the Hammies stalwarts...

A message from Andrew Bradley on the passing of his father, Cecil John Bradley

Dear Hamiltonians Thank you very much for the messages re my dad, Cecil John Bradley. He was always a good supporter of Hammies and really enjoyed his outings to support the club, not so much in recent years, but managed to get up the stairs last year to have dinner...

Hammies 3rds dig deep & hold onto top spot!

There was a real tension in the air as two unbeaten 3rd teams gathered on a near perfect day for Rugby at Hamilton on Saturday. The early kick off {1 pm} saw two giants of 3rd team Rugby face up for what was always going to be a real test of character and...

Klaasen shows his class in local derby win!

Last year’s SLA top try scorer with 14 tries – Centre, Harlon Klaasen showed why he was signed by WP. Making only his second start of the season after returning from provincial duty, he scored a first half hat-trick of tries and then added a fourth in the second half....

1st XV Top Performers according to the stats

10 games in and coming off a solid win away at Pniel we have a week off before taking on SK Walmers at home on the 15th. With just a handful of games left too as we challenge for the SLA title and Gold Cup inclusion we have a look at our top contributors this season....

Bartels runs past Pniel

Hamilton SP-RFC disappointed after the surprise home loss against Tygerberg RFC a week ago wanted to prove why they are still top of the SLA log when they visited bottom of the league table, Pniel-Villagers RFC on Saturday. With several players out injured, Head...

After 9 Rounds we have a look at the clubs top contributors

As we look ahead to our away game at Pniel Villagers this weekend and start the downhill run of the season lets see who our top points and try contributors are for the season. So far this season we have scored 234 tries working out 26 tries for the club each week at...
